text: "Midnight Sun" is a song by American country music artist Garth Brooks. It was released in March 24, 2008 as the third and final single from third compilation album The Ultimate Hits. ==Music video== The music video and premiered on March 28, 2008 on GAC. It debuted at number 20 on GAC's Top 20 Country Countdown for the week of April 11, 2008. ==References== Category:2008 songs Category:Garth Brooks songs
title: Midnight Sun (song)
